value.stringValue: Data Capture Form Risk Assessment-Site Specific

Flow.description: Creation : SFS-3065 Updated as a part of SFS-4229 Updated as a part of SFS-4321 Updated as a part of SFS-5431 updated as a part of SFL-951
Flow.label: DCF SPS Complex & Standard combined

fields.name: KiskosP1
fields.fieldText:
• Check building/kiosk for any signs of damage externally and internally.

• All building/kiosks are cleaned removing any debris.

• Report any issues

fields.name: KiskosP2
fields.fieldText:
• Visual check that all (lighting/heating/panels/cables) are free from debris, no signs of damage.

• Report any issues.

fields.name: KiskosP3
fields.fieldText: • All relevant site paperwork available, in a file/folder and in good condition including permits.

fields.name: COSHHHeading
fields.fieldText: Chemical dosing rig : WHERE REQUIRED

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_ValveCheck
fields.fieldText:
• COSHH Data should be always readily available and correct PPE should be adhered to                                                                                     

• Check for signs of any leaks/spillages either on dosing rig or bund area/containment.

• Check to see if dosing pump is working correctly.

• Check dosing delivery line through to wet well, make sure there is no visible damage/kinks.

• Check chemical storage level and COSHH data if level low report it to the planner for reordering.

• Report any issues

screens.name: Copy_1_of_Valve_chamber_dry_well_Make_sure_that_all_mechanical_parts_are_operate
screens.label: Valve chamber/dry well: Make sure that all mechanical parts are operated safely at all times and not being operated under unnecessary main pressure)

fields.name: Copy_1_of_ValveCheck
fields.fieldText:
• Check sump pump operation and condition.

• Clear sump channel of any debris before returning it back into service clear any debris deposits (Rag/FOG/Grit) from valve chamber/ dry well

• Report any issues

fields.name: WellCleanliness
fields.fieldText:
• Check cleanliness of well (Rag/FOG or Grit), if cleanse is required make sure to report/ share using WhatsApp or picture message.

• If FOG levels high have ECAS been made aware of any issues.

TAKE PHOTOS OF WET WELL AND RETURN WITH SAP JOB

fields.name: Copy_2_of_displaytextonly
fields.fieldText:
• Clean all floats and invert to make sure all working correctly. If applicable

• Clean Pulsar head unit and start pump to test whether level is being read. If applicable

• Contact planner to check active alarms, also if it’s applicable.

• Check flow meter flow rate. ( OR ) Use pump data plate to ascertain pump flow ( OR ) Drop test the wet well.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_displaytextonly
fields.fieldText:
• Run all pumps individually to check on their performance.

• Bottom well if possible to check on cleanliness of the base of the well make sure to.

• Fail all individual pumps and contact planner to check active failed alarm.

• Report if otherwise.

fields.name: displaytextonly
fields.fieldText:
﻿Area : {!myServiceTeritorry.Name}

Date / Time : {!DateTime}

Names: {!UserName}

screens.name: EDM_Requirements_WHERE_REQUIRED_ON_PERMITTED_SPS
screens.label: EDM Requirements – WHERE REQUIRED ON PERMITTED SPS

fields.name: EDMP1
fields.fieldText:
EDM Requirements – WHERE REQUIRED ON PERMITTED SPS

• Check EDM monitor is secure and in good condition

• Check nothing is obstructing or interfering with monitor accuracy

• Check monitor is correctly located to record discharge to watercourse data

fields.name: FaultScreen
fields.fieldText: We have an Exception when try to create DCF Infra record, please connect with Admin to resolve the issue: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Intro
fields.fieldText:
INTRODUCTION :

This Data Capture Form will be used to gather data on our stations and allow us to build a more affective resilience plan going forward. By filling out and signing this document after completion you are informing your Manager/Senior Tech that you have given the site where applicable a full inspection/audit, corrected any issues and instructed in the comments sections.


Operational site visit :

1. COMPLETE SPS GOLDEN MEASURES STANDARD CHECKLIST

2. ADD PHOTOS TO SAP TASK

3. COMPLETE AND FEEDBACK WORK REQUIRED

4. COMPLETE MEASURING POINTS FOR SPS


Measure point Questions :

fields.name: Q1_Has_the_relevant_Golden_measures_check_sheet_been_completed
fields.fieldText: Q1. Has the relevant Golden measures check sheet been completed

fields.name: Q2_Have_all_actions_and_maintenance_been_raised_in_SAP
fields.fieldText: Q2. Have all actions and maintenance been raised in SAP

fields.name: MaintenanceP1
fields.fieldText:
Maintenance :

• Has routine maintenance been carried out in line with planned frequency?

• Has site lubrication been completed on screens , pumps other equipment – Where applicable

• Has end to end testing been completed

fields.name: OdourP1
fields.fieldText:
Odour Treatment plant - WHERE REQUIRED

• Check functionality of units & associated equipment

• Check inlet/outlet H2S & record

• Check irrigation & adjust as required

• Record appropriate data as required

• Check blower suction filters where required

screens.name: Permit_requirements_WHERE_REQUIRED_ON_PERMITTED_SPS
screens.label: Permit requirements – WHERE REQUIRED ON PERMITTED SPS

fields.name: PermitP1
fields.fieldText:
Permit requirements – WHERE REQUIRED ON PERMITTED SPS

• Have we got a contingency plan for this site? 

• Copy of pump station key protection measures on site (in new EPR permit paperwork)

• Is there an asset out R/A in place for any assets unavailable?

fields.name: SiteP1
fields.fieldText:
• Check all site signage is present, clean, readable and undamaged, with relevant information

• Report any issues

fields.name: SiteP2
fields.fieldText:
• Check gates for any major damage and can be locked

• Check perimeter fence line for any damage or signs of trespassing.

• Report any issues

fields.name: SiteP3
fields.fieldText:
• Check grounds maintenance on site.

• Report any issues with pictures/ details

fields.name: StornCheckP1
fields.fieldText:
Storm tanks & overflows/outfalls - WHERE REQUIRED

• If applicable check storm tank condition and follow golden measures procedure and reporting

fields.name: StormCheckP2
fields.fieldText:
• Visual check that all (lighting/heating/panels/cables) are free from debris, no signs of damage.

• Report any issues.

screens.name: Valve_chamber_dry_well_Make_sure_that_all_mechanical_parts_are_operated_safely_a
screens.label: Valve chamber/dry well: Make sure that all mechanical parts are operated safely at all times and not being operated under unnecessary main pressure)

fields.name: ValveHeading
fields.fieldText: Valve chamber/dry well : (Make sure that all mechanical parts are always operated safely and not being operated under unnecessary main pressure)

fields.name: ValveCheck
fields.fieldText:
• Check operation of all NRV’s

• Check all valves open/closed limits

• Check and grease spindles arms

• If there are any signs of excessive wear, corrosion. report any issues

fields.name: Copy_1_of_displaytextonly
fields.fieldText:
WET WELL CHECKS :

• Check wet well lids are safe and free from excessive corrosion

• Wash around lid area inc around springs, hinges, stays, nuts, and bolts to remove excessive debris

• Check wet well lid springs, rods, pins, nuts, hinges, and bolts are free from corrosion

• Check lid runners are free from debris

• Lubricate all hinges, stays, springs, nuts and bolts

• If loose tighten any nuts where required

• Check condition of guide rails/brackets/Blue rope and anchor points for any excessive corrosion

• Check condition and tag dates of all lifting equipment if applicable.

• Check that all gridding clips are secure and painted the correct annual colour any missing or damaged make sure to replace at once

• Check gridding for excessive corrosion and check clip colour is correct

• Report any issues with picture evidence/details
